articles.title: Jio reveals plans for 5G launch in India: rollout plans for 1,000 cities completed - 91mobiles
articles.description: Ahead of the planned 5G rollout in India, Reliance Jio has already finished planning its 5G coverage in the top 1,000 cities across the country. Here are the details on the Jio 5G launch in India.
